notesStmt.note: Catalogue of Hebrew Manuscripts in the Gaster Collection, the British Library, London (London: Hebrew Section. Oriental and India Office Collection, 1996).

collation.p: 9 quires: i(10-2) (including the 3 unfoliated flyleaves at the beginning), ii-viii(6), ix(8-2)

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi sursive script of the 19th century.

binding.p: BM in-house, marble paper. Spine: 'Heilbut. Bethah Yoseph. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 9938.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Moses Gaster (b. 1856, d. 1939), scholar and rabbi: his manuscript, Cod. G. 106; purchased by the British Museum from him on 12 April, 1924: inscribed, (back flyleaf [iii]v).
